nodes.text: Durbin was a village located on the Twin World of Talus. After being overrun by wild creatures, it was known as the Lost Village of Durbin.

Located in the Akazi Plains, east of Lake Bondoma, the village of Durbin was surrounded by a winding river and a tall hill which was capped with a small geyser. This geyser was surrounded by a number of berserk kahmurra.

The village of Durbin was once a growing settlement. However, around 19 BBY, the village was overrun by a hoard of wild sludge panthers. Those who did not escape suffered a grizzly demise, as evidenced by the number of skeletons strewn about the now abandoned village. It continued to be dangerously overrun by sludge panthers throughout the Galactic Civil War.

Following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, intrepid spacers would brave the now derelict village in order to either hunt the sludge panthers, or pillage the village of any remaining loot. Mysteriously, one spacer collected an acid sword called the Xris Acid Sword, named after Rodian hunter Sordaan Xris. The sword was found impaled in the skeletal remains of one of the deceased villagers.

When the creatures invaded the village, a farmer was forced to abandon the farm he had built in Durbin. Circa 1 ABY, the farmer died and his son inherited the farm. The farmer's son requested a spacer to eliminate all the creatures in Lost Village of Durbin, to honor memory of the farmer.
